title: SoundCraft Audio â€” Product catalog updates + cart robustness

requirements.summary: Add the three requested products to the product showcase/catalog UI (Cable marking stickers, XLR cables, Used musical instruments).
acceptanceCriteria: The product list displayed on the site includes items named "Cable marking stickers", "XLR cables", and "Used musical instruments" (spelling corrected to XLR).
Each of the three products is visible in the product showcase UI without layout regressions on mobile and desktop.

file_operations.description: Create a dedicated catalog/product showcase section that renders a responsive grid of product cards, including the three new products. Use shadcn-ui Card/Button styling patterns to match the existing design system. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Add a small, frontend-owned product list/config used by the catalog section, including names "Cable marking stickers", "XLR cables", and "Used musical instruments" (and any optional display details such as description, image reference, and optional price).
Wire the new CatalogSection into the landing page composition (no new top-level routes), ensuring it is placed in a visible location and uses a stable section id for navigation.
Add a navigation item that scrolls to the catalog section (anchor-style behavior consistent with existing header navigation). Ensure the new section is discoverable without adding new routes.

requirements.summary: Ensure the existing Add to Cart flow supports the three new products and handles missing prices without breaking totals or UI.
acceptanceCriteria: Visitors can add and remove each of the three new products to/from the cart using the existing cart UI.
If a product has no configured price, the UI clearly indicates that the price is unavailable (English text) and the cart does not break (no NaN/undefined totals or crashes).

file_operations.description: Implement a lightweight cart state hook (and any supporting types) that supports add/remove/update quantity, computes totals safely, and treats missing prices as non-numeric (avoid NaN) while still allowing the item to be in the cart.

Create a cart UI surface (e.g., sheet/drawer) that lists cart items with add/remove controls, per-item price display that shows an English "Price unavailable" message when missing, and a total that never renders NaN/undefined. Use shadcn-ui Sheet/Button/Card (and similar) to align with existing UI. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Wire each product card's "Add to Cart" action to the cart hook so the three new products can be added/removed using the same cart behavior; ensure products with missing price clearly show "Price unavailable" in the catalog as well, without disabling the UI or breaking layout.

Wire the cart UI into the existing header so users can open the cart and remove items; include a cart trigger/button that is visible on desktop and mobile. Use shadcn-ui Button/Sheet patterns. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Allow product entries to omit price (optional/undefined) and ensure the new products are configured in a way that exercises the missing-price behavior (at least one item can have an unset price if prices are not configured) without breaking cart calculations.
